title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid username, password, email, and name, and that a token is provided.

steps.description: Send POST request to /auth/signup with valid username, password, email, and name
Verify response status is 200 or 201 indicating successful registration
Verify response contains authentication token

title: User Registration with Missing Required Fields
description: Verify that user registration fails when required fields are missing or empty in the signup request.

steps.description: Send POST request to /auth/signup with missing username
Verify response status code is 400 or appropriate client error
Send POST request to /auth/signup with empty password
Verify response returns validation error message

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify a user can log in successfully with correct username/email and password, receiving a valid session token.

steps.description: Send POST request to /auth/login with valid username/email and password
Verify response status is 200 and contains a valid authentication token

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails and returns error messages when incorrect username/email or password is used.

steps.description: Send POST request to /auth/login with invalid password
Verify response status is 401 or 403 with error message

title: Create Server with Valid Data
description: Verify users can create a new server with required valid data and server is correctly stored.

steps.description: Send authenticated POST request to /servers/ with valid server details
Verify response status is 201 and server data is returned
Send GET request to /servers/ to confirm the newly created server is present
Verify the created server exists in the list

title: Fail to Create Server with Invalid Data
description: Verify server creation is rejected when providing invalid or incomplete data.

steps.description: Send POST request to /servers/ with missing mandatory fields
Verify response status is 400 and appropriate validation errors are returned

title: Update Server Member Roles
description: Verify that server member roles can be updated successfully through API, and roles persist correctly.

steps.description: Send authenticated request to update member roles via server management API
Verify response status is success and roles updated accordingly

title: Create and Switch Channels within a Server
description: Verify channel creation inside a server and ability to switch between channels properly.

steps.description: Create a channel inside an existing server
Verify channel creation response is successful with correct data
Select the newly created channel
Verify the channel is selected and UI updates appropriately

title: Send and Receive Real-Time Messages
description: Verify users can send and receive messages in real-time via Socket.IO, and that messages appear instantly in the chat interface.

steps.description: Establish socket connection to chat server
Send a chat message through the socket to the channel
Verify the message is received by all channel participants immediately

title: Handle Socket Disconnect and Reconnection Automatically
description: Verify that the client automatically reconnects on Socket.IO disconnection and message loss is prevented.

steps.description: Simulate socket disconnection
Verify client attempts reconnection automatically
Send messages during disconnected state and after reconnection
Verify no messages are lost and chat history is updated correctly

title: Retrieve and Display Message History
description: Verify that chat history is loaded correctly when user joins a channel, showing past messages in chronological order.

steps.description: Join a channel with existing message history
Verify message history is displayed with correct timestamps and order

title: Initiate 1:1 Voice Call Successfully
description: Verify that a user can initiate and establish a 1:1 voice call with another participant over WebRTC with signaling.

steps.description: Initiate voice call to another user
Verify call connection is established with clear audio

title: Join and Maintain Group Video Call
description: Verify that multiple users can join the same video call session and maintain stable audio/video streams.

steps.description: Multiple users join a group video call
Verify each participant's audio and video streams are visible and clear

title: Handle Media Permission Denied during Call
description: Verify appropriate error handling and user notification when media device permissions are denied during call initiation.

steps.description: Attempt to start a call with denied camera/microphone permissions
Verify user receives informative error message and call is not initiated

title: Start and Stream Screen Sharing During a Call
description: Verify the user can start screen sharing during an ongoing call and that all participants can see the shared screen clearly and without interruption.

steps.description: During a call, initiate screen sharing using getDisplayMedia API
Verify screen content is streamed to all call participants and is stable

title: Toggle Dark and Light Theme Modes
description: Verify that the user can switch between dark mode and light mode themes and that the changes apply immediately and persist after app restart.

steps.description: Switch UI theme from default to dark mode
Verify UI updates to dark mode immediately
Restart the app
Verify theme selection persists and dark mode is retained

title: Enable and Disable Do Not Disturb Mode
description: Verify that Do Not Disturb mode can be toggled and that notifications behave accordingly when enabled.

steps.description: Enable Do Not Disturb mode in UI settings
Verify notifications are suppressed while mode is enabled
Disable Do Not Disturb mode
Verify notifications resume normally

title: Edit User Profile Successfully
description: Verify that users can edit their profile information using profile editing modal and changes persist.

steps.description: Open profile editing modal and update profile fields (e.g., name, email)
Save changes
Verify changes are reflected in the UI and persisted across sessions

title: Application Window Controls Functionality
description: Verify minimize, maximize, and close custom window controls function correctly on supported OS platforms.

steps.description: Click minimize button
Verify application window minimizes properly
Click maximize button
Verify application window maximizes and restores properly
Click close button
Verify application closes or prompts as designed

title: Session Persistence and Automatic Login with Valid Token
description: Verify that when the user has a valid stored token, the app allows automatic login and restores the user session.

steps.description: Login and store authentication token
Restart application
Verify user is automatically logged in using stored token and session validated

title: Handle Invalid or Expired Token during Session Validation
description: Verify the app correctly handles invalid or expired tokens by requiring the user to login again.

steps.description: Store an expired or invalid token
Restart application
Verify user is redirected to login screen and prompted to authenticate
